Description: 
Collection factory Alawar games for October 2014
Alawar Entertainment is a company specializing in the development and distribution of computer games for the mass 

audience users on personal computers, mobile platforms, game consoles and other platforms.

Previously, the company Alawar Entertainment specialized in publishing casual games, and now the company has focused 

on developing and publishing free-to-play games. During the company's work was published in more than 300 private games 

brands.
